title: Mules and Men -  images of seeing

content.question: In the second paragraph, the images of seeing and looking all refer to the speaker's experience of

choices.label: becoming aware of new modes of fashion
seeking to improve herself through travel
recognizing her early exposure to folklore

content.answer: recognizing her early exposure to folklore

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
